text: Gruyère Cheese () is a hard yellow cheese from Switzerland. It is produced in the French -speaking village with the same name. ==Milk of Gruyère Cheese== It is made from the milk of cows. ==Taste of Gruyère Cheese== Gruyère is sweet but slightly salty, with a flavor that varies widely with age. ==Photos== Category:Swiss cheeses
title: Gruyère cheese
